article:
Look at the girl. Her name is Lucy. And this lovely girl is her twin sister Lily. _ parents are both  teachers. They work hard.
Lucy and Lily _ at No.4 Middle School. They go to school _ Monday to Friday. They have no classes on Saturdays and Sundays. They have breakfast at 6:30. They go to school at 7:00. Classes
 _ at eight. They have four _ in the morning and three in the afternoon. They have _ at 12: 15. At 3:50,they have sports.
Lucy and Lily study Chinese, math, English, geography, physics, history and other lessons. Lucy's favorite _ is music, _ it's relaxing. Lily likes science best. She thinks it's difficult _ interesting.
Their parents like reading. They often read books at home. Their parents are strict with  them, but sometimes they are very kind and friendly to their children. Lucy and Lily love their  _  very much.
